siteMetadata.description: Personal website of Drew McMillan, a software engineer in London, UK. Drew is currently working at BBC News on a brand new React/Node stack and has a strong interest in all things frontend web.

node.html: Written by Drew McMillan, a Software Engineer building fancy stuff with JavaScript. Currently at BBC News building article pages, completely open source using the latest JS!
